ch.lambdaj.proxy
Class ProxyUtil

java.lang.Object
  ch.lambdaj.proxy.ProxyUtil

public final class ProxyUtil
extends Object

An utility class of static factory methods that provide facilities to create proxies

Author:
Mario Fusco, Sebastian Jancke

Method Detail

isProxable

public static boolean isProxable(Class<?> clazz)
Check if the given class is nor final neither a primitive one

Parameters:
clazz - The class to be checked
Returns:
True if the class is proxable, false otherwise

createProxy

public static <T> T createProxy(InvocationInterceptor interceptor,
                                Class<T> clazz,
                                boolean failSafe,
                                Class<?>... implementedInterface)
Creates a dynamic proxy

Parameters:
interceptor - The interceptor that manages the invocations to the created proxy
clazz - The class to be proxied
failSafe - If true return null if it is not possible to proxy the request class, otherwise throws an UnproxableClassException
implementedInterface - The interfaces that has to be implemented by the new proxy
Returns:
The newly created proxy

createIterableProxy

public static <T> T createIterableProxy(InvocationInterceptor interceptor,
                                        Class<T> clazz)
Creates a proxy of the given class that also decorates it with Iterable interface

Parameters:
interceptor - The object that will intercept all the invocations to the returned proxy
clazz - The class to be proxied
Returns:
The newly created proxy
